articles.title: 'Definitely not rooted in science': Health experts slam UK's decision to keep SA on red list - News24
articles.description: The UK's decision to keep South Africa on the travel red list has been criticised by medical experts.
articles.content:
Local health experts have described the United Kingdom’s decision to keep South Africa on the travel red list as "irrational" and "flimsy". 
This week, the United Kingdom updated its international t… [+190 chars]

articles.title: Two New Zealand 'gang associates' arrested after trying to smuggle a car full of KFC - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: This is the second arrest related to smuggling fast-food across the border into Auckland, a city enforcing strict Covid-19 lockdown restrictions.
articles.content:
Two New Zealand men were arrested on Sunday after attempting to cross the Auckland border with a car "full" of Kentucky Fried Chicken, chips, and 10 tubs of coleslaw, according to local police. 
The… [+2123 chars]

articles.title: Chinese social media users are in an uproar over Evergrande's letter to employees - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: The letter that Evergrande chairman Xu Jiayin sent to employees became a trending topic on the country's Twitter-like platform, Weibo.
articles.content:
Chinese social media users on the country's Twitter-like platform, Weibo, are in an uproar over a letter Evergrande chairman Xu Jiayin sent to employees on September 21.

articles.title: United States set to lift travel ban for vaccinated South Africans - BusinessTech
articles.description: The US will soon allow entry to most foreign air travelers as long as they’re fully vaccinated against Covid-19 — while adding a testing requirement for unvaccinated Americans and barring entry for foreigners who haven’t gotten shots.

articles.title: Mzansi reacts to Ithana dropping out of 'Idols SA' race amid health concerns - TimesLIVE
articles.description: "I know that this will not be the last time South Africans see her on their screen," said M-Net's Local Channels Entertainment director Nomsa Philiso in a statement.
